ingredients: 1 pound lean ground beef,   +   1/2 cup bread crumbs, 3 tablespoons minced onion, 2 tablespoons water, 1 large egg, 1 (8 ounce) can jellied cranberry sauce,   +   3/4 cup chili sauce, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, 1   +   1/2 teaspoons lemon juice
nutrition: Total Fat 10g 13%, Saturated Fat 4g 20%, Cholesterol 53mg 18%, Sodium 85mg 4%, Total Carbohydrate 15g 6%, Dietary Fiber 1g 2%, Total Sugars 10g, Protein 10g, Vitamin C 9mg 46%, Calcium 19mg 1%, Iron 1mg 8%, Potassium 183mg 4%
